schema:name: Number of additional tree pests and diseases becoming established in England, 2000-2009 to 2014-2023

schema:creator.schema:name: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

schema:isBasedOn.schema:description:
Annual statistical report providing the key performance indicators (KPIs) for the Forestry Commission. This report provides updates on the Forestry Commission’s 10 headline indicators, Forestry England’s 6 headline indicators and 23 further indicators for Forest Services. Each indicator is for England as a whole at national level.

This is an Official Statistics publication. The report itself is accompanied by tables of supporting data providing the indicator statistics.
schema:isBasedOn.schema:name: Forestry Commission Key Performance Indicators: Report for 2023-24
schema:isBasedOn.schema:text: Annual report on the full suite of Forestry Commission key performance indicators (KPIs) for both Forest Services and Forestry England.

schema:distribution.name: Forestry Commission Key Performance Indicators: Report for 2023-24
Forestry Commission Key Performance Indicators: Report for 2023-24 supporting data

schema:variableMeasured: Number of additional tree pests and diseases becoming established within a rolling 10-year period
notes:
Data are presented in rolling 10-year time periods.
    
</br>Data for 2002 to 2011 and 2003 to 2012 were revised in an earlier update of this indicator.

columns.name: 10_year_period
columns.schema:description: The year range for the data present

columns.name: value
columns.schema:description: Number of additional tree pests and diseases becoming established in England within a rolling 10-year period
